name: Legion of Super Heroes: Shrinking Violet Online Trivia | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Shrinking Violet's real name?
questions.explanation:
Salu Digby.

	Kari Wahlgren voiced the role of Shrinking Violet on the WB animated series, "Legion of Super Heroes".

questions.text: What is Shrinking Violet's planet of origin?
questions.explanation:
Imsk.

	All of the inhabitants of Imsk share Shrinking Violet's power to shrink to microscopic size. In some continuities, her parents were both inhabitants of Imsk but Shrinking Violet was actually born on Earth.

questions.text: In the classic "Outcast Super Heroes" story, Superboy and Supergirl are forced to resign.  In order to wipe their minds, Shrinking Violet has to place a microscopic kryptonite tablet in their brains.  How does she get out of Superboy's brain area after his super anti bodies begin to attack her?
questions.explanation:
Through a tear drop.

	After placing the tablet, Superboy's antibodies began to attack.  Superboy began thinking about his Kryptonian parents, making himself sad enough to conjure up a tear which Shrinking Violet snuck out in.

questions.text: In the early years of the Legion, Shirking Violet dated one of the Heroes of Lallor.  Which one?
questions.explanation:
Duplicate Boy.

	The Heroes of Lallor were a super team that originally were conned into believing the Legion was their enemy.  Once they learned the truth, the two teams remained friends for years to come.

questions.text: Shrinking Violet was not admitted to the Legion in her first attempt to audition.  She, along with two other future members, were passed over initially.  Which two members where passed over with her during their initial auditions?
questions.explanation:
Sun Boy and Bouncing Boy.

	Sun Boy, Bouncing Boy, Shrinking Violet, Supergirl and Brainiac 5 all auditioned for membership at the same time.  Only Supergirl and Brainiac 5 were admitted the first go around.  The other three were all admitted during a later audition.

questions.text: Unbeknownst to her fellow members, Shrinking Violet was actually kidnapped and tortured by a group of radicals from her home planet.  The Legion weren't aware of this because a Durlan infiltrated the Legion by assuming Vi's look and powers on the team.  What was the name of this imposter?
questions.explanation:
Yera.

	Violet harbored much contempt for Yera, who was a constant presence around the Legion since Yera eventually married Colossal Boy.  In the Five Year Later continuity, Violet eventually forgave Yera, accepting the fact that Yera had been duped into her role by the Imskian terrorists.

questions.text: In the 5YL (Five Year Later) continuity, Vi has a prominent alteration to her appearance. What is it?
questions.explanation:
A facial scar.

	She has a long scar from forehead down through her right eye and cheek.  It was given to her by Cosmic Boy during the Battle of Venado Bay.  Vi was representing the military of Imsk which was a war with Cosmic Boy's home planet of Braal.  She chose not to have the scar removed.

questions.text: During the 5YL (Five Year Later) continuity, the Legion find themselves on the run, having been framed by the Earthgov.  Violet takes over Legion leadership and the small team of characters all assume new identities.  What is Violet's codename during this time?
questions.explanation:
Virus.

	Her tenure as leader and as Virus is short lived, as all of continuity is eventually wiped clean and a new continuity (commonly referred to as Reboot Legion) takes its place.

questions.text: In the Reboot continuity, Vi becomes corrupted by the Emerald Eye (referring to herself as Veye).  After a long battle, she is freed from it's control and has been left with enhanced abilities.  What is her new code name?
questions.explanation:
LeViathan.

	Vi gains the ability to expand her size. The Legionnaire known as Leviathan had previously died in battle.  Salu pays homage to his memory by assuming the name LeViathan.

questions.text: In the continuity referred to as "Threeboot", she is again an early recruit to the LSH.  She does not use the moniker Shrinking Violet in this particular continuity.  Instead, her code name is what?
questions.explanation:
Atom Girl.

	In this continuity she disappears after an early Legion mission.  Her character is considered by most later recruits as being nothing but a myth.
